
i've never seen the ocean

# BITSY VERSION 4.8

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

0,69,96
0,10,0
205,205,255

ROOM 0

END 0 15,5

DLG SPR_0

ITM 0

NAME star

ITM 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME talk
DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - not in person,{br}at least
  - lots of people haven't,{br}i think
  - lots of them never will
  - it's strange:
  - seeing the ocean is said{br}to make people feel small
  - not having seen it{br}does the same to me
}
"""

END 0
i've never seen the ocean{br}{br}{br}{br}but maybe someday i will

VAR a
42
